item.title: 对于大多数专业人员来说，混合工作模式已经形成。但银行和金融服务业的情况并非如此，在这些行业中正在出现明显的鸿沟
item.description:
For most professional workers, a well-established hybrid work pattern is now established. Not so at banks and financial services where a stark divide is opening up https://t.co/rZur5JC5tB pic.twitter.com/wtnJStC3xi

— Financial Times (@FT) March 7, 2024

item.title: 波罗的海成为北约的湖泊。"瑞典最终将加入北约，这意味着西方防御联盟几乎包围了整个波罗的海。
item.description:
'The Baltic Sea becomes a Nato lake.'⁠

Sweden is set to finally join Nato, meaning the western defence alliance has nearly ringed the entire Baltic Sea, a significant oil trading route for Russia and home to one of its fleetshttps://t.co/6ab91S2Y9L pic.twitter.com/dgYvZpdGD9

— Financial Times (@FT) March 7, 2024

item.title: 今日评论：英国选民继续变得越来越不稳定，部落意识越来越淡薄，这意味着保守党的 "加拿大 1993 "式末日和保守党第五次连任并非不可能：
item.description:
Today's note: British voters continue to get more volatile and less tribal which means that both the 'Canada 1993' style apocalypse for the Conservatives and a fifth Tory term aren't impossible: https://t.co/xwAwYCngIO

— Stephen Bush (@stephenkb) March 7, 2024

item.title: 杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）在大选前的重要预算案中传递的首要信息是，艰难的经济选择正在取得成效。但没有提及的是，残酷的财政清算迫在眉睫
item.description:
Jeremy Hunt’s overriding message in his big pre-election Budget was that hard economic choices are paying off. Left unsaid was the brutal fiscal reckoning looming https://t.co/ojdxAHW7Vj pic.twitter.com/iy3P0YlNe7

— Financial Times (@FT) March 7, 2024

item.title: 尽管投资巨大，竞争日益激烈，但在欧洲，铁路旅行仍然比飞机慢、贵。我们将解释其中的原因：
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 7, 2024
